version_description:
- Dark mode support
- L3/R3 gamepad button support
- Login fix

- Dark mode support
- L3/R3 gamepad button support
- Login fix
Minor fixes.
Minor fixes.
We are constantly improving Shadow so you can enjoy the best possible experience. In this release, we have greatly improved the reliability of video streaming and devices management.

iOS 13 support
iOS 13 support

- Shadow connection protocol updated
- Bitrate and video settings now updated at start

- Shadow connection protocol updated
- Bitrate and video settings now updated at start
Fix crash on iOS 13
Fix crash on iOS 13
Fixed the bug where you had to tap twice on the same location to actually do a click on Shadow.
Fixed the bug where you had to tap twice on the same location to actually do a click on Shadow.
Revamped interface
Revamped interface
Support of native shortcuts
Support of native shortcuts

- Various fixes and improvements
- Removed the Quick Launch feature

- Various fixes and improvements
- Removed the Quick Launch feature

Hello, #TeamShadow!

We're proud to release a huge version today.

Mouse & keyboard are now fully supported. Note that cursor locked feature is not yet available and you need to have iOS 13.4 or more to benefits these features.
Game con
